name: I MAKE SAINTS
description:
You have long since been punished.

But we cannot stop you from experiencing your actions over and over. Welcome to guilt.

I Make Saints is an ambient interactive experience to be completed in one sitting. Total playtime is estimated at 20 minutes.

---

CONTENT WARNING
I Make Saints contains sensitive subject matter, and as such, might not be suitable for all audiences or broadcast on all platforms. The scenario indirectly references serious crimes of a sexual nature committed towards children. Please proceed to play this interactive experience with caution. 

---

Controls
Left Mouse Button - Click through menus / main title screen
WASD - Move around
Mouse - Look around
E - Interact with objects / doors
ESC - Exit Menu

---

Game design and music by Somewhat

---

Versions available to download

FREE EDITION

Contains the main experience of I Make Saints, as well as our eternal gratitude to give us some of your time trying out this weird little experience.

SOUNTRACK EDITION

Contains all of the above, plus a 5-track soundtrack that is ROYALTY FREE to use in your own games. As a way of saying thank you to whoever wishes to pay for a digital copy of I Make Saints, Somewhat humbly offers the soundtrack of the game to be used in your own projects. 

Of course, if you decide to use the soundtrack for your creations, a proper credit would be appreciated, where you could link back to this itchio page. Also, feel free to contact us to show us how you used our sounds, it's always great to communicate between creative types.
